TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Table extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlCompositeElement

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 or above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is w:tbl.
